name: contracts
description: Foundry-based template for developing Solidity smart contracts

scripts.format: pnpm biome format --write src test script lib
scripts.test:coverage:report: forge coverage --report lcov && genhtml lcov.info --branch-coverage --output-dir coverage
scripts.deploy:flow: source .env && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url $FLOW_RPC_URL --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY --broadcast --verify --verifier blockscout --verifier-url https://evm-testnet.flowscan.io/api
scripts.deploy:flow:mainnet: source .env && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url $FLOW_MAINNET_RPC_URL --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY --broadcast --verify --verifier blockscout --verifier-url https://evm.flowscan.io/api
scripts.deploy:rootstock: REQ_TIMEOUT=100000 source .env && forge script script/Deploy.s.sol:Deploy --rpc-url $ROOTSTOCK_TESTNET_RPC_URL --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY --broadcast --legacy --evm-version london
